name: Nimbbl-SDK
description:
Accept payments easily on your app with the Nimbbl iOS SDK.

Get 1-click checkout, higher conversions with multiple buy now pay laters and payment gateways via a single Nimbbl SDK implementation.

Nimbbl supports all payment options - Buy Now Pay Later, UPI, Google Pay, Phonepe, Debit/Credit Cards (Visa/ Mastercard/ RuPay/ American express), 50+Netbanking, Wallets and more.
